content.raw:
Actually, there is one failing test, [UNIT_ImagesView_TEST.xml.<init>](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/73/testReport/UNIT_ImagesView_TEST/xml/_init_/). This test was passed on my Ubuntu 15.04 but Jenkins complains as:
```
test 123
        Start 123: UNIT_ImagesView_TEST

123: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/gazebo/gui/viewers/UNIT_ImagesView_TEST "-xml" "-o" "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test_results/UNIT_ImagesView_TEST.xml"
123: Test timeout computed to be: 240
123: SharePercentChange[0.68052] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
123: ResPercentChange[1.31297]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
123: UNIT_ImagesView_TEST: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/mutex.hpp:108: boost::mutex::~mutex(): Assertion `!posix::pthread_mutex_destroy(&m)' failed.
123: SharePercentChange[0.000270577] ShareMaxPercentChange[1]
123: ResPercentChange[0.328223]ResMaxPercentChange[3]
123/184 Test #123: UNIT_ImagesView_TEST ...................***Exception: Other 76.83 sec
```
content.html:
Actually, there is one failing test, UNIT_ImagesView_TEST.xml.<init>. This test was passed on my Ubuntu 15.04 but Jenkins complains as:

test 123
        Start 123: UNIT_ImagesView_TEST
